markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 168</row>

An olfactory effect can affect only creatures that can smell it. This applies only to olfactory parts of the effect, as determined by the GM.
name: Olfactory
